exterior.paige_nextDungeon: This is where the next dungeon is?

basement.paige_thatsMaxwell: That's Maxwell! We have to free him!

rescueMaxwell.maxwell_trappedDownHere: I've been trapped down here for days!
rescueMaxwell.paige_gladYoureOk: Maxwell, I'm so glad you're OK!
rescueMaxwell.maxwell_cafeteria: I'm famished. Come with me to the cafeteria upstairs, and let's talk there.

cafeteria.paige_basement: How did you end up in the basement, Max?
cafeteria.lenna_basement: How did you end up in the basement?
cafeteria.maxwell_dangerousExperiments: He had been doing some dangerous experiments...
cafeteria.paige_wroteToMe: I remember you wrote to me about this!
cafeteria.maxwell_triedToStop: I tried to stop him, and he turned my own earthquake machine against me.
cafeteria.maxwell_impressiveMachine: It's an impressive machine, isn't it? You got to experience it as well, didn't you?
cafeteria.lenna_yesBut: Yes, but that wasn't what we came here for...
cafeteria.maxwell_whatDo: Well, what can I do for you?
cafeteria.maxwell_quakemaker2000: I stumbled across it when I was installing the Quakemaker2000.
cafeteria.maxwell_getYouIn: I can get you in there, but you'll have to find your own way out.

study.maxwell_stand: Stand on the + when you're ready.
study.maxwell_delvin: If you find Delvin down there, let him know he's fired!

maxwell_whatDoYouKnow: The dungeon's entrance was behind an old bookcase all along!
